data.title: Add Relationship
data.text: Mr. John Kunze is President, Board Member and Chief Executive Officer of Xoom Corporation. He joined Xoom as a Board Member in 2004, was named President and Chief Executive Officer of Xoom in 2006. Prior to Xoom, he was President, Chief Executive Officer and member of the Board of Directors of Plumtree Software, Inc., a provider of enterprise software solutions, until they were acquired by BEA Systems, Inc., in 2005. Before he joined Plumtree in 1998, he worked at Adobe Systems Inc., in a variety of product roles. He holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Economics from Franklin & Marshall College in Pennsylvania.
